alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Jackson; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Owsley, northwestern Perry, east central Jackson, southwestern Breathitt and northeastern Clay Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Conkling, or near Booneville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cowcreek around 315 PM EDT. Gobbard, Trixie, Ricetown and Felty around 320 PM EDT. Sebastian around 325 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Newfound, Teges, Arnett, Ammie, Lucky Fork, Oneida, Hensley, Mistletoe, Morris Fork, Seth, Buckhorn, Whoopflarea, Valjean, Brutus, Dalesburg, Barcreek and Spurlock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
